title: Paradise (Season 1)
description: A Secret Service agent investigates the murder of a former president in a seemingly peaceful community. As hidden agendas and shocking truths emerge, the investigation unveils secrets that threaten everyone involved.

title: Adolescence (Miniseries)
description: When a 13-year-old is accused of the murder of a classmate, his family, therapist, and the detective in charge must unravel the truth. The series explores the effects of a crime on a community and the complexity of youth.

title: Hacks (Season 4)
description: Legendary Vegas comedian Deborah Vance navigates toxic relationships and ambitious rivalries with her young writer. The dark mentorship and vigorous humor drive Season 4 as both characters face new artistic and personal challenges.

title: Dexter: Resurrection (Season 1)
description: Dexter Morgan awakens from a coma and pursues redemption in New York City, determined to find his son Harrison. Has Miami Metro's Angel Batista investigates, Dexter realizes he cannot escape his bloody past.

title: The Pitt (Season 1)
description: The lives of healthcare professionals in a busy Pittsburgh hospital. Personal crises, workplace politics, and the emotional toll of treating critical patients demand both resilience and empathy.

title: Poker Face (Season 2)
description: Charlie, gifted at detecting lies, travels across America solving strange crimes. Season 2 expands her adventures as she gets embroiled in more mysteries, each with unique characters and twists.

title: Mythic Quest (Season 4)
description: The head of a video game studio battles staff drama and industry pressures to maintain their hit title. Season 4 develops key relationships as creative conflict intensifies within the team.

title: Daredevil: Born Again (Season 2)
description: Matt Murdock faces off against Wilson Fisk as secrets from their past threaten the safety of Hell's Kitchen. The new season brings heavier stakes and more complex character arcs.

title: The Rehearsal (Season 2)
description: Nathan Fielder enables people to rehearse important life moments using elaborate staged environments. Season 2 deepens its exploration of meta-comedy and human anxiety.

title: Stick (Season 1)
description: A washed-up golfer finds hope coaching a troubled teenage prodigy after his own family falls apart. Their bond gives both a shot at redemption through sport.

title: The Studio (Season 1)
description: A legacy Hollywood movie studio fights to survive as the tension between art and business reaches new heights. The series explores the behind-the-scenes madness and satire of modern filmmaking.

title: Black Mirror (Season 7)
description: Stand-alone dramas explore techno-paranoia, with sharp, suspenseful and satirical tales about technology's impact on society. New episodes investigate increasingly disturbing futures.

title: John Mulaney Presents: Everybody's In LA
description: Comedian John Mulaney examines Los Angeles in six hilarious live installments, spotlighting local personalities and the city's eccentricities.

title: The White Lotus (Season 3)
description: Guests and employees at a luxury resort experience revealing interactions, mishaps, and secrets over one transformative week, with this season set in a new exotic locale.

title: The Night Agent (Season 2)
description: Low-level FBI agent Peter Sutherland is drawn into a massive conspiracy. He battles intrigue and danger that leads him deeper into the political underbelly of the White House.

title: The Bear (Season 4)
description: A talented chef returns to Chicago to run his family's sandwich shop, struggling to transform the business while managing personal and professional relationships.

title: Platonic (Season 2)
description: Two former childhood friends reconnect as adults and navigate awkward, comedic scenarios while rebuilding their friendship through life's absurdities.

title: Side Quest
description: The series follows the lives of employees and players impacted by the hit game Mythic Quest, diving into the humor and challenges of the gaming industry.

title: The Floor (Season 3)
description: Eighty-one contestants stand on an enormous floor, facing challenges to remain standing and compete for a grand prize in a riveting game show format.

title: Your Friends & Neighbors (Season 1)
description: A hedge fund manager resorts to burglary after losing his job, targeting his wealthy neighbors, but a fateful mistake puts his family at risk.

title: Running Point
description: Overlooked Isla Gordon becomes president of an LA basketball team and strives to prove herself amid family and professional challenges.

title: Alien: Earth
description: A mysterious space vessel crash-lands, bringing new threats and tactical soldiers face-to-face with Earth's greatest danger.

title: Dept. Q
description: Carl, a guilt-ridden ex-detective, becomes obsessed with solving cold cases while battling personal demons and corruption within law enforcement.

title: Bad Thoughts
description: A series of darkly funny vignettes each exploring disturbing but comedic twists on everyday situations.

title: Missing You (Miniseries)
description: Detective Kat Donovan's world unravels when she finds her estranged fiancé on a dating app, triggering her to reopen her father's unsolved murder.

title: Severance (Season 2)
description: A dystopian workplace demands employees compartmentalize their lives using a controversial procedure. Season 2 amplifies the paranoia and reveals the consequences of separating memory from work.

title: Wolf Hall: The Final Chapter
description: Thomas Cromwell navigates the turbulent politics of Henry VIII's court, as intrigue and betrayal reach an epic conclusion in this acclaimed miniseries.

title: Dying for Sex
description: Diagnosed with terminal cancer, a woman seeks to embrace life by exploring her sexuality, supported by her best friend in an emotionally raw journey.

title: The Last of Us (Season 2)
description: Joel and Ellie journey through a devastated America, facing deadly threats in a post-apocalyptic world where hope and loss intertwine.

title: Foundations (Season 3)
description: Enemies gather in the shadow of the Foundation, and the fate of humanity hangs in the balance as revolutionary forces threaten galactic order.

title: Chef's Table: Legends
description: A deep dive into the kitchens and lives of legendary chefs including Jamie Oliver and Alice Waters, blending artful cinematography with their personal stories.

title: Race Against Time
description: Survivors of Hurricane Katrina recount the disaster's 20th anniversary, exploring how their city was transformed and what lessons were learned.

title: Companion
description: A weekend getaway turns to chaos as secrets emerge, challenging the trust among friends in a remote cabin.

title: Wake Up Dead Man: A Knives Out Mystery
description: Detective Benoit Blanc faces his most dangerous case yet, navigating twists, secrets, and high-stakes drama in a sequel to Glass Onion.

title: Thunderbolts
description: An unconventional group of antiheroes confront their pasts in a perilous mission that exposes the darkest corners of their lives.

title: Weapons
description: A shocking disappearance shakes a community when all but one child from the same class vanish simultaneously, raising questions no one can answer.

title: Avatar: Fire and Ash
description: Jake and Neytiri's family mourns the loss of Neteyam as they encounter the Ash People, reigniting conflict and struggle on Pandora.

title: F1: The Movie
description: A retired Formula One driver joins forces with a younger racer, blending mentorship and high-speed adrenaline in a race for glory.

title: Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning
description: The IMF team faces off against a rogue AInamed Entity in a global race to stop a catastrophic world-ending threat.

title: Sorry, Baby
description: After a tragedy, Agnes's world falls apart while those around her continue on, exposing deep emotional truths and resilience.

title: One Battle After Another
description: A group of ex-revolutionaries unite to rescue a friend's daughter following the return of a powerful enemy after 16 years.

title: Tron: Ares
description: A highly advanced Program named Ares is sent to the real world on a critical mission, challenging the boundaries between digital and human existence.

title: Wicked: For Good
description: Elphaba's relationship with Glinda leads them down separate paths in the finale to the acclaimed adaptation of Broadway's Wicked.

title: Superman
description: Clark Kent reconciles his Kryptonian heritage and human identity as he faces a modern world skeptical of his ideals.

title: Mo (Season 2)
description: Mo Amer's Netflix comedy dives deeper into immigration politics, blending Palestinian, American, and Mexican cultures with dry humor.

title: Common Side Effects
description: A man discovers a wonder mushroom cure, but Big Pharma hunts him down in this animated satire exploring health and absurdity.

title: Fallout (Season 1)
description: Set in a post-apocalyptic future, a Vault dweller journeys through the devastated American wasteland, encountering mutated creatures and clashing factions as she uncovers secrets about humanity's survival.

title: Shōgun (Season 1)
description: Adapted from James Clavell's novel, an English navigator shipwrecks in feudal Japan and navigates political intrigue, samurai culture, and forbidden romance at the dawn of a new era.

title: Echo (Season 1)
description: Maya Lopez returns to her hometown, confronting her criminal family and facing her legacy. Set in the MCU, Echo combines intense action with personal redemption.

title: Ripley (Season 1)
description: Tom Ripley, a charming conman, is hired to persuade a wealthy acquaintance to return to America, but the job plunges him into a world of deception, murder, and identity theft.

title: The Three-Body Problem (Season 1)
description: Humanity faces a mysterious extraterrestrial threat after a Chinese scientist makes first contact, forcing unlikely collaborators to prevent Earth's destruction in this visually stunning adaptation.

title: Expats
description: A group of American women living in Hong Kong form a fragile community, dealing with personal loss and cultural challenges amid international intrigue.

title: True Detective: Night Country (Season 4)
description: Detective Liz Danvers investigates a chilling case in Arctic Alaska as supernatural elements and personal demons blur the line between reality and myth.

title: Oppenheimer
description: J. Robert Oppenheimer grapples with scientific breakthroughs and moral dilemmas as the founder of the atomic bomb in Christopher Nolan's acclaimed historical drama.

title: Dune: Part Two
description: Paul Atreides unites Fremen to avenge his house and fulfill a prophecy, as galactic war and personal destiny shape the fate of Arrakis.

title: Barbie
description: When Barbie is expelled from Barbieland, she sets out on a journey of self-discovery in the real world. The movie blends satire, adventure, and heartfelt moments.

title: The Regime
description: A European autocrat faces paranoia, betrayal, and revolution as her regime teeters on the edge, exploring morality in power's shadow.

title: Invincible (Season 2)
description: Teen hero Mark Grayson balances family, romance, and bloody battles as Invincible, discovering new challenges and cosmic threats in the latest season.

title: Jury Duty
description: A regular guy, Ronald Gladden, believes he's serving jury duty on an ordinary civil trial, unaware that the entire proceeding is fake and everyone around him — from the judge to his fellow jurors — are actors in a carefully staged social experiment blending scripted humor and genuine reactions.

title: Constellation
description: After surviving a disaster aboard the International Space Station, astronaut Jo attempts to reunite with her family but discovers reality may be forever altered.

title: Abbott Elementary (Season 3)
description: Teachers at a struggling Philadelphia public school battle bureaucracy and budget woes with wit and camaraderie. Season 3 deepens friendships and tackles new classroom chaos.

title: Maestro
description: A portrait of legendary conductor Leonard Bernstein, detailing his musical genius, tumultuous marriage, and enduring legacy within American culture.

title: Past Lives
description: Childhood friends separated by immigration are reunited decades later, confronting fate, longing, and the nature of true love in this acclaimed Oscar-nominated drama.

title: American Fiction
description: A frustrated novelist lampoons Black stereotypes and finds unexpected fame, blurring the line between satire and reality in this award-winning film.

title: Poor Things
description: Bella Baxter, brought back to life by an eccentric scientist, explores womanhood and freedom in a surreal, Oscar-winning fantasy.

title: The Bear (Season 3)
description: Carmy and his frenetic kitchen crew confront new pressures and ambition after their Emmy wins, balancing chaos and creativity in a beloved Chicago restaurant.

title: The Gilded Age (Season 2)
description: Old money and new money compete in 1880s New York, with society scandals and family ambitions colliding on HBO's Emmy-lauded period drama.

title: Succession (Season 4)
description: The ruthless Roy family's power struggle for control over their media empire reaches its shocking conclusion in the Emmy–sweeping finale.

title: The Crown (Season 6)
description: The BAFTA favorite depicts the final years of Queen Elizabeth II's reign, capturing royal family drama and the changing tide in modern Britain.

title: Beef
description: A road rage incident spirals into obsession, revenge, and dark humor as two strangers' lives unravel in this Emmy-winning limited series.

title: Anatomy of a Fall
description: A woman faces trial for her husband's mysterious death in a gripping courtroom drama that swept the Cannes Film Festival and the Oscars.

title: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
description: Miles Morales travels the multiverse alongside Gwen Stacy, encountering an elite team of Spider-People in a visually dazzling, award-winning animated adventure.

title: All of Us Strangers
description: A lonely screenwriter encounters his deceased parents and a mysterious neighbor, blurring reality and longing in this acclaimed film festival darling.

title: The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel (Season 5)
description: In her final act, Midge Maisel's wit and ambition close out her Emmy–winning journey, making comedy history one last time.

title: One Piece (Season 1)
description: The live-action adaptation of the celebrated manga follows Monkey D. Luffy and his renegade crew on a swashbuckling quest for the Grand Line's fabled treasure.

title: Reservation Dogs (Season 4)
description: Four Indigenous teens in rural Oklahoma face dreams, grief, and adulthood with resilient humor in this Peabody Award–winning FX series.

title: Mr. & Mrs. Smith (Season 1)
description: Two secret agents enter an arranged marriage, balancing spycraft and domesticity in this stylish, Emmy–buzzed reboot of the action-romance classic.

title: Society of the Snow
description: The harrowing real-life tale of survivors of the 1972 Uruguayan Andes plane crash, painstakingly recreated in this Oscar-nominated international film.

title: The Holdovers
description: A curmudgeonly teacher at a New England prep school remains on campus over winter break with a small group, discovering unlikely friendship and growth.

title: The Last of Us (Season 1)
description: A hardened survivor and a teenage girl cross a dangerous post-pandemic America. The Emmy–winning adaptation delivers emotion, terror, and hope.

title: The Zone of Interest
description: The director of Auschwitz builds a dream home next to the camp, exploring horror and denial through the neighbor's seemingly ordinary family life.

title: The French Dispatch
description: Wes Anderson's whimsical film presents a trio of stories from the staff of a fictional American magazine's outpost in a French city.

title: The Boys (Season 4)
description: As super-powered corruption escalates, a ragtag group battles supes and conspiracy, blurring lines between heroism and monstrosity.

title: Slow Horses (Season 3)
description: A team of disgraced MI5 agents investigates British intelligence scandals and deadly conspiracies with wit and tenacity.

title: Silo (Season 2)
description: Juliette investigates deeper secrets below Earth's last silo, discovering revelations that threaten to upend the only world the survivors have known.

title: The Morning Show (Season 4)
description: Behind-the-scenes power struggles and personal intrigue at a top morning news program reflect changing media, #MeToo, and national crises.

title: Ted Lasso (Season 3)
description: American coach Ted Lasso brings optimism and chaos to a struggling British football team, confronting rivalries, romance, and the heart of teamwork.

title: The Fall of the House of Usher
description: The last members of a wealthy, corrupt dynasty confront fate, family secrets, and supernatural revenge in this Poe-inspired gothic drama.

title: Wednesday (Season 2)
description: Wednesday Addams solves supernatural mysteries at Nevermore Academy, confronting growing power and dark family legacy.

title: Loki (Season 2)
description: Loki and Mobius face chaos in the multiverse as alliances, betrayals, and destiny define gods and dimensions alike.

title: Andor (Season 2)
description: The rebellion ignites as Cassian Andor's espionage shapes the galaxy's fate in the lead-up to the original Star Wars trilogy.

title: Severance (Season 1)
description: A mysterious procedure splits work and home lives for Lumon employees, unraveling conspiracies about control and identity.

title: Only Murders in the Building (Season 4)
description: Three amateur sleuths investigate ever twistier murders in their New York apartment building while fueling a hit podcast.

title: The Mandalorian (Season 4)
description: Din Djarin and Grogu journey deeper into Mandalorian lore, facing new allies, old enemies, and the growing threat to the galaxy's balance.

title: House of the Dragon (Season 2)
description: Targaryen civil war looms as dragons and rival claimants threaten to split the Seven Kingdoms, leading to legend-shaping conflict.

title: Yellowjackets (Season 3)
description: Adult survivors of a wilderness plane crash unravel more secrets as their past decisions and traumas resurface, merging horror and psychological suspense.

title: Shrinking
description: A therapist breaks long-held rules and starts telling patients exactly what he thinks, causing upheaval in their lives—and his own.

title: Fargo (Season 5)
description: A new cast contends with Midwestern crime, violence, and oddball detectives in the wildly creative anthology series inspired by the Coen Brothers.

title: Lessons in Chemistry (Miniseries)
description: In 1960s America, chemist Elizabeth Zott rebounds from sexism by hosting a cooking show that challenges stereotypes and inspires generations.

title: The Diplomat (Season 1)
description: The new U.S. ambassador to the U.K. juggles global crises, high-stakes diplomacy, and her complex marriage in this tense political drama.

title: Killers of the Flower Moon
description: Martin Scorsese's epic about the Osage Nation murders explores greed, betrayal, and justice in 1920s Oklahoma.

title: Saltburn
description: A college outsider's invitation to an aristocratic estate unravels secrets, obsession, and twisted relationships in this acclaimed satire.

title: Asteroid City
description: During a junior stargazer convention in 1955, chaos ensues as residents, scientists, and visitors become entangled in Wes Anderson's meticulously designed world.

title: The Curse (Season 1)
description: A couple's new HGTV show appears cursed, spiraling their lives into surreal disasters and darkly hilarious moments.

title: The New Look (Season 1)
description: Christian Dior and Coco Chanel battle to define French fashion's legacy amid war, innovation, and scandal.

title: Unstable
description: A biotech genius and his socially awkward son bond and bicker while saving the family company from chaos.

title: Dead Ringers
description: Twin gynecologists push the boundaries of medical ethics and co-dependency, spiraling into darkness in this feminist thriller.

title: The Marvels
description: Carol Danvers, Kamala Khan, and Monica Rambeau unite to face a cosmic entanglement, blending Marvel action with character-driven humor.

title: Swift Horses
description: A newlywed couple's fragile peace is disrupted by the husband's enigmatic brother's arrival, set against the restless backdrop of 1950s America.

title: Griselda
description: The rise of Griselda Blanco, the notorious Colombian businesswoman and drug lord, exposes brutality, empowerment, and the dark side of ambition.

title: The Iron Claw
description: The Von Erich wrestling dynasty's towering success and tragic family losses become an emotional saga of fame and resilience.

title: Priscilla
description: Sofia Coppola's subtle drama explores Priscilla Presley's life with Elvis, focusing on love, control, and autonomy in the shadow of fame.

title: Napoleon
description: Joaquin Phoenix stars as Napoleon Bonaparte, tracing his campaigns and relationship with Josephine across epic European battlefields.

title: Drive-Away Dolls
description: Two friends set out on a spontaneous road trip that quickly devolves into a wild caper involving criminals, mistaken identities, and misadventures.

title: The White Darkness
description: Based on the true story of explorer Henry Worsley's perilous solo trek across Antarctica, this miniseries explores resilience, obsession, and the limits of human endurance.

title: Star Wars: The Acolyte
description: Set during the final days of the High Republic, a former Padawan and her Jedi Master investigate dark side secrets while sinister forces threaten the galaxy.

title: Twisters
description: A new generation of storm chasers confronts the fury of nature as increasingly destructive tornadoes threaten heartland America, blending science, suspense, and survival.

title: Elio
description: An imaginative boy is mistaken for Earth's leader and abducted by aliens, forced to navigate galactic diplomacy in a cosmic adventure from Pixar.

title: Berlin (Season 1)
description: A prequel to 'Money Heist', following the origin and exploits of the enigmatic thief Berlin as he orchestrates ambitious heists before the events of the original series.

title: Rain Dogs
description: A working-class single mother and her young daughter navigate poverty, love, and survival in London with the help of an eccentric, privileged friend. Their unconventional bond weaves humor and heartbreak into a raw exploration of family, class, and resilience.

title: Apples Never Fall
description: The Delaney family unravels when their matriarch disappears, exposing secrets and fractures beneath their seemingly perfect suburban life.

title: The Last Airbender (Season 1)
description: In a war-torn world of elemental magic, young Aang awakens to master the elements and fulfill his destiny as the Avatar, uniting divided nations.

title: Air
description: The story behind Nike's pursuit of rookie Michael Jordan, transforming sports marketing and sneaker culture through vision, risk, and dealmaking.

title: Ferrari
description: Enzo Ferrari risks everything in 1957, battling rivals, family tragedy, and the legendary Mille Miglia in this stylish racing biopic.

title: Argylle
description: A reclusive spy novelist's life is upended when her new book mirrors a real espionage plot, leading her on a globe-trotting adventure with twists and laughs.

title: Atlas
description: An elite analyst must trust a rogue AI to save humanity from a new threat, but hesitation leads to high-stakes conflict and game-changing alliances.

title: The Artful Dodger
description: Set in 1850s Australia, the infamous pickpocket reinvented as a surgeon is forced back into London's criminal underworld by an old friend.

title: The First Omen
description: A young American is sent to work at a church in Rome, where she uncovers terrifying secrets leading to the rise of evil in this chilling franchise prequel.

title: The Ministry of Ungentlemanly Warfare
description: Guy Ritchie directs the untold story of WWII's first covert British combat unit—a band of eccentrics whose tactics changed modern warfare forever.

title: Palm Royale
description: Set in 1969 Palm Beach, an ambitious woman will do anything to break into high society, blending satire, glamor, and cutthroat ambition.

title: Ripley
description: The seductive, shape-shifting Tom Ripley infiltrates another world for fortune, freedom, and love. Each episode pushes the line between deception and reality.

title: Pain Hustlers
description: A struggling single mother finds success at a failing pharmaceutical startup—until the prosperity spirals into criminal conspiracy and moral reckoning.

title: May December
description: An actress researches a notorious tabloid marriage for a movie role, uncovering buried secrets and blurred lines between truth and performance.

title: Brooklyn 45
description: In post-WWII Brooklyn, a group of veterans gathers for cocktails and an impromptu séance, but spirits and old wounds rise with sinister results.

title: Sugar (Season 1)
description: Private detective John Sugar investigates the disappearance of a Hollywood producer's granddaughter, uncovering a labyrinth of secrets beneath Los Angeles's glamorous surface.

title: Dark Matter
description: A physicist is pulled into alternate realities after being abducted, forcing him to fight for his family and identity in a mind-bending universe.

title: Ripley Underground
description: Tom Ripley returns in a tense sequel as art fraud spirals into murder and deception, mixing suspense and psychological intrigue across Europe.

title: Under the Bridge
description: Based on a chilling true story, a journalist and detectives unravel the mystery behind a teenager's murder in a tight-knit Canadian town.

title: Shards of Blue
description: A young woman discovers hidden powers after a chance encounter at a remote lake, thrust into an ancient battle between worlds.

title: Queen Charlotte: A Bridgerton Story
description: A young Queen Charlotte's marriage to King George of England sparks an epic love story and a societal shift that redefines the monarchy and the world of Bridgerton. As she rises to power, Charlotte navigates duty, passion, and the political intricacies of 18th-century Britain.

title: House of Guinness (Season 1)
description: Follows the aftermath of the death of brewery mogul Sir Benjamin Guinness and the great impact of his will on the fate of his four adult children: Arthur, Edward, Anne, and Benjamin, set in 19th-century Ireland.

title: Monster: The Ed Gein Story (Season 3)
description: The third installment in the Monster anthology series focuses on convicted murderer and grave robber Ed Gein, exploring his influence on horror culture and examining society's obsession with true crime.

title: Zero Day (Season 1)
description: Robert De Niro stars as a former U.S. President who leads a commission investigating a devastating cyberattack that has claimed thousands of lives and threatens national security.

title: IT: Welcome to Derry (Season 1)
description: A prequel series to the IT films that explores the origins of Derry's deadly curse, set before the events of the movies and delving into the town's dark history.

title: Marvel Zombies (Season 1)
description: An animated series exploring an alternate universe where Marvel superheroes have been infected by a zombie virus, creating a dark twist on familiar characters.

title: The Sisters Grimm (Season 1)
description: An animated series following two sisters who discover they are descendants of the famous Brothers Grimm and must use fairy tale magic to solve mysteries and protect their town.

title: Chad Powers (Season 1)
description: A disgraced college quarterback named Russ Holliday disguises himself as Chad Powers and walks onto a struggling southern football team to revive his football career.

title: The Naked Gun (Movie)
description: A reboot of the classic comedy franchise featuring the bumbling detective Frank Drebin as he leads Police Squad to save the world with his particular set of skills.

title: Happy Gilmore 2 (Movie)
description: Adam Sandler returns to his iconic role as the former hockey player turned golf pro in this long-awaited sequel, bringing his unique brand of humor back to the greens.

title: The Last Frontier (Season 1)
description: Set in the rugged wilderness of Alaska, this series follows families and individuals trying to survive and build new lives on America's final frontier.
